thread.title: Doug Kass' Trade of the Week: Yahoo! (YHOO)
thread.title_full: Doug Kass' Trade of the Week: Yahoo! (YHOO) - TheStreet

author: thestreet.com/
title: Doug Kass' Trade of the Week: Yahoo! (YHOO)
text:
Reddit Email Reprint This article originally appeared at 8:19 a.m. EDT on Real Money Pro , where Doug Kass files regularly throughout the day in his Daily Diary . Kass, of Seabreeze Partners, is known for his accurate stock market calls and keen insights into the economy. Here he discusses why he's adding to this tech holding, in his Trade of the Week .
NEW YORK ( RealMoneyPro ) -- I'm adding to my long position on Yahoo! ( YHOO - Get Report ) -- which closed at $34.50 yesterday but is up $0.60 in premarket trading -- because the risk-vs.-reward quotient now appears asymmetrical.
Sanford Bernstein reversed its longstanding cautious view of Yahoo! this morning, writing in a note that the stock's price "currently discounts the worst-case scenario on many fronts, and at this price our fundamental analysis and sum of the parts suggest limited downside vs. significant potential upside."
I agree, particularly after the adverse reaction to the second-quarter earnings announcement from Alibaba ( BABA ) .
Sanford Bernstein also put a $52 12-month price target on YHOO, although that seems ambitious to me!
YHOO Price data by YCharts
